caption: No crosswalks. No commutes. Just arches and dreams. ğŸ¾ğŸ¾ğŸ¾

story.en: She arrived where red steel arches carved the sky and bay breezes whispered secrets. On the Golden Gate, SOL stretched across the railing, the sunrise painting her fur in amber. Fog rolled across the water like drifting clouds, and the cityâ€™s hills peeked through pockets of light. No horns. No hurryâ€”only the bridgeâ€™s quiet vigil and her steady gaze.
